docs.title: Welcome to GenData RAG SaaS
docs.text: This project creates a secure, multi-tenant RAG service using Vectara + FastAPI + Streamlit.

docs.title: System Architecture
docs.text:
• Frontend: Streamlit UI
  • Backend: FastAPI
  • RAG Engine: Vectara
  • Auth: Supabase/Auth0
  • Docs: GitHub Pages (MkDocs)

docs.title: Tech Stack Overview
docs.text: This project provides a fast-to-launch, secure Retrieval-Augmented Generation SaaS platform for document-heavy businesses.

docs.title: 🔧 Core Components
docs.text: Layer Tool Description RAG Engine Vectara Ingestion, indexing, and GPT-powered query generation Backend API FastAPI Lightweight, async Python API Frontend Streamlit Simple, Python-native UI with no JavaScript Auth (planned) Supabase / Clerk Secure role-based user auth Billing (planned) Stripe Subscription and usage-based billing Docs MkDocs + Material Theme Developer-friendly documentation site CI/CD GitHub Actions Auto-deploys the docs to GitHub Pages

docs.title: 🌐 Key Resources
docs.text:
• Vectara API Docs
  • FastAPI Docs
  • Streamlit Docs
  • Supabase Docs
  • Stripe Docs
  • MkDocs Material Theme

docs.title: How to Use
docs.text:
1. Upload documents via a dashboard
  2. Ask questions in chat
  3. View responses sourced from your knowledge
